meanings.definition: A slang term for Canadian one-dollar coins.
meanings.sent1: I used two loonies to buy a chocolate bar.
meanings.sent2: The vending machine only accepts loonies and toonies.
meanings.sent3: My friend thought I was joking when I paid with loonies.
meanings.sent4: The sound of loonies clinking together is music to my ears.
meanings.sent5: I always keep a few loonies in my pocket for emergencies.

meanings.definition: A slang term for someone who is crazy or eccentric.
meanings.sent1: The old man down the street is known as the neighborhood loonie.
meanings.sent2: People often avoid the loonies who shout on street corners.
meanings.sent3: My uncle is a loonie, but we love him for his wild stories.
meanings.sent4: She's a loonie when it comes to collecting vintage toys.
meanings.sent5: The loonies at the comedy club always make me laugh.
